comment._content: Thanks for sharing such a great shot of the nave. I can certainly use this for my webpage at http://www.malaysian-explorer.com/st-mary.html Cheers! The Malaysian Explorer

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Here's a pic from the Australian Town & Country Journal...presumably taken at about the time of the consecration in January 1890...viewed from similar location albeit in diferent lighting conditions - nla.gov.au/nla.news-page5232166
